Why choose TA Design awnings?

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text max_width=”400″]Awnings are useful for shielding an area or window from the sun’s rays and heat. They also provide shelter from prying eyes, decorate the facade of a building, create a usable environment outside a house-even in summer-and limit electricity consumption. In fact the shading of windows with awnings causes less heat to penetrate inside the house: this will result in less use of both air conditioners and fans.

The advantages of a boxed arm awning
Less maintenance, more durability Shelters the whole fabric except only the valance Keeps the arms and mechanical parts of the tent protected as well.

Total protection
It also forms a barrier to smog, fog, bugs and other insects.

Aesthetics
More aesthetically elegant: the closed awning disappears completely, leaving only the box in view.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding”
